definition: No lie, telling the truth, being serious
example: That movie was incredible, no cap

definition: Agreement, okay, sounds good
example: Wanna hang out later? Bet!

definition: For real, for real - emphasizing truth or agreement
example: That test was so hard fr fr

definition: End of discussion, final statement
example: I'm the best at this game, periodt

definition: To do something excellently or look amazing
example: You absolutely slayed that presentation

definition: It reminds me of, it has the vibe of
example: This outfit is giving main character energy

definition: Somewhat, kind of, secretly
example: I'm lowkey excited about this party

definition: Obviously, definitely, openly
example: I highkey love this song

definition: Really good, especially referring to food
example: This pizza is absolutely bussin

definition: Mediocre, average, not impressive
example: That movie was pretty mid honestly

definition: Charisma, charm, ability to attract someone
example: He's got serious rizz with everyone

definition: Someone who does too much for someone they like
example: Stop simping and just be yourself

definition: Suspicious, questionable, sketchy
example: That excuse sounds pretty sus to me

definition: Excellent, amazing, really good
example: Your new haircut is absolutely fire

definition: Stylish outfit or good fashion sense
example: Your drip is unmatched today

definition: Being yourself regardless of others' opinions
example: That's such a based take on the situation

definition: Lie, false statement, not true
example: You saying you studied all night is cap

definition: Something that's really good, especially music
example: This new song absolutely slaps

definition: I understand, you don't need to explain more
example: Free food at the event? Say less!

definition: Assessing someone's mood or energy
example: You seem off today, just doing a vibe check
